text.content:
Hand it Over

Unless you succeed at a @Check[type:reflex], your target gains possessions of your weapon.

Melee

Broken

Your weapon's current Hit Points are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Broken]{Broken}, the weapon takes [[/r 3d6]] damage, ignoring Hardness.

Ranged

Smash the Floor

You kick up a cloud of dust, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

You made 'em Faster

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Quickened]{Quickened} for 2 rounds.

Spell
